reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Running ada insights to validate the system revealed the data gap immediately. What to improve: Should have checked for actual reflection data earlier in Phase 1c cycle. Lesson: Always validate with real data, not just tests â€” a passing test suite doesn't mean the system is being used.
